dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So the Ministry of Defense in Kazakhstan just announced that redeployment of military equipment is underway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the Ministry of Defense in Kazakhstan just announced that redeployment of military equipment is underway.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following the recent military parade in Astana, personnel and military equipment are returning to their places of deployment. In this regard, the Ministry of Defense has issued a statement to the citizens of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I saw that—they're moving everything back after that huge parade in Astana. Over 4,000 personnel, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that-they're moving everything back after that huge parade in Astana. Over four thousand personnel, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In honor of this holiday and to commemorate the 80th anniversary of the Great Victory, a large-scale military parade took place in Astana, featuring more than 4,000 service members, over 200 units of military equipment, and 66 aircraft and helicopters from the front line, army, and military transport aviation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and more than 200 units of equipment, plus aircraft. They're using both rail and road transport.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and more than two hundred units of equipment, plus aircraft. They're using both rail and road transport.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The transfer is being carried out both by rail and under the equipment's own power.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're asking citizens not to spread rumors, which is uh, pretty standard after big movements like this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're asking citizens not to spread rumors, which is uh, pretty standard after big movements like this.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "In connection with the movement of military vehicles, the Ministry of Defense urges citizens to refrain from spreading false information and to rely solely on official sources," the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. They want people to stick to official sources, especially with all the vehicles on the move.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. They want people to stick to official sources, especially with all the vehicles on the move.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The process should wrap up by May 14, according to the ministry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The process should wrap up by May fourteen, according to the ministry.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The process is expected to be completed by May 14.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That parade was massive—Defender of the Fatherland Day combined with the 80th anniversary of the Great Victory.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That parade was massive-Defender of the Fatherland Day combined with the eightieth anniversary of the Great Victory.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 7, Kazakhstan celebrated Defender of the Fatherland Day. In honor of this holiday and to commemorate the 80th anniversary of the Great Victory, a large-scale military parade took place in Astana, featuring more than 4,000 service members, over 200 units of military equipment, and 66 aircraft and helicopters from the front line, army, and military transport aviation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a big deal there. Tengrinews.kz even did a broadcast from Independence Square.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a big deal there. the website even did a broadcast from Independence Square.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tengrinews.kz aired live from Independence Square at the "Kazakh Eli" monument.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right by the "Kazakh Eli" monument. Must've been quite the spectacle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right by the Kazakh Eli monument. Must've been quite the spectacle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tengrinews.kz aired live from Independence Square at the "Kazakh Eli" monument.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. I wonder who all was invited to attend something like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. I wonder who all was invited to attend something like that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Probably a mix of dignitaries, veterans… you know, the usual for such commemorations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Probably a mix of dignitaries, veterans... you know, the usual for such commemorations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes sense. It's good they're being transparent about the logistics afterward too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes sense. It's good they're being transparent about the logistics afterward too.
